rows.label: tev018901_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Yardley if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev018901_MSG0001
rows.name:
Let me guessâ€”you're feeling a touch of guilt?
Pshaw. You mustn't consider these things so deeply.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018901_MSG0002
rows.name:
Let's just pretend that the time between now and when
we can reclaim our bodies from the Lifehold Core is
one long Halloween party...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018901_MSG0003
rows.name:
and you're merely wearing a most spectacular
costume![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018901_MSG0004
rows.name: There. Doesn't that make you feel better?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018901_MSG0006
rows.name:
Everyone is supposed to be given mimeosomes that
mimic their real-life bodies, but there were some
who tried to have their appearances changed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018901_MSG0007
rows.name:
All humans are insecure about something or other.
When you received your mimeosome, did the thought
of requesting a few touch-ups never occur to you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018901_MSG0008
rows.name:
...What? You have no memory of receiving your
mimeosome at all?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018901_MSG0009
rows.name:
Ha ha ha! Well, aren't you lucky!
The world is full of people who would gladly pay
a fortune to gain a new look like that.[ST:wait ]
